title: Extract shared/otelserver/ from existing OTEL collector
description: Extract the OTEL HTTP server from Agent.StartOtelCollector() (otel.go) into shared/otelserver/ package. Create OtelServer struct with Callbacks (OnLogs, OnMetrics, OnTraces). Binds 127.0.0.1:0 random port. Both Claude and Codex adapters will embed this.
